entry.title: Escape the Silence
entry.summary:
Author: KiaoweLaccu

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 41,613Chapters: 19/22Kudos: 73

Summary: This is a sequel and does not stand alone. Please read A Prison of Red Lights first. Thanks! Run… …the wind whispered in the night, a familiar keening under the gaze of the half moon. …run… The whisper grew, echoing off the broken walls, building to a crescendo, the staccato of panting breaths keeping in rhythm with the wind’s urgent cry. Moonlight flashed in faded blue eyes as they turned pleading to the moon above. …run! Their prison of Red Lights left behind them, Chan and Hyunjin follow a call as they desperately seek to escape the burning world around them, guided by the moon and their love for each other. Involves my own loose interpretation of wolf and moon mythology.DISCLAIMER: While they share names and appearances, this is based on the characters portrayed in the videos, not the idols themselves.

entry.title: Don't Let Me Drown
entry.summary:
Author: Violetsandrosess

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 155,744Chapters: 31/?Kudos: 590

Summary: The door creaked open, and Chan's presence entered the room like a sudden breeze. Hyunjin's gaze snapped towards the entrance, his heart pounding in his chest. He watched as Chan's eyes darted between the shattered mirror and him on the bed, a confusion evident in his expression. For a fleeting moment, their eyes locked, and then recognition dawned in Chan's features. It was as if the pieces fell into place, and the lines of worry etched themselves onto Chan's brow.“You’re supposed to be at practice.” The words felt like sandpaper in Hyunjin’s mouth, they came out hazy and unfamiliar.“I never leave anyone behind.”ORHyunjin is hurting and he wants Chan to put him back together again

entry.title: movie night
entry.summary:
Author: notsi11yw0rm (si11yw0rm)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,576Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 230

Summary: Seungmin knew he should move.He could almost hear his brother’s voice in his head — a warning and a reminder at the same time that Chan had been around since they were kids, the big brother Seungmin wasn’t supposed to think about like this.But Chan wasn’t looking at him like an older brother should. The movie light flickered over them, shadows playing along Chan’s jaw, his eyes fixed on Seungmin like he was the only thing worth watching. For years, Seungmin’s only had one goal whenever he was alone with his older brother’s best friend — sit close enough to Bang Chan to pretend it’s an accident. But tonight, Chan’s the one closing the distance, and Seungmin realizes he might finally get exactly what he’s been wanting… and more than he’s ready for.

entry.title: Five minutes
entry.summary:
Author: wolfrush

Summary: When Minho doesn’t answer, Chan lifts his chin, fingers curling tighter around the remote control until Minho can see his veins protrude. His voice is cold and level when he speaks.“Watch.”Chan’s thumb presses down on the button. Immediately, Yongbok seizes with a yell. Noise crackles through the air, static fills the room that makes Minho’s hairs stand up. All alongside a quiet whirring, quickly drowned out by the loud cries that spill from Yongbok’s mouth.“What did you do to him?!”, Minho growls, fists balled, and eyes burning.Chan, the stupid bastard, smiles calmly. “Mh, you see, it was kind of hard to get my hands on you”, he explains with a drawl. His hand swings the remote control around vaguely. Minho watches it with tense eyes, as if Chan could press the button again at any moment. “You’re a bit… some would say skittish, but I would call it… elusive. Our sweet little Felix however…”**Or: Minho has been a menace as always, Chan needs to take him down a notch, and Felix wears a shock collar to help force his older brother into submission.
